shows.descriptionEpg: All new thrillingly dark drama starring Krysten Ritter and Keeley Hawes. A group of women must navigate a dangerous world of conspiracies in a bid to uncover who they really are.

shows.title: Family Guy
shows.description: Join the utterly bonkers Griffin family on their wacky escapades
shows.descriptionEpg: Join the utterly bonkers Griffin family on their wacky escapades in this irreverent sitcom. Watch them strive to cope with everyday life as they lurch from crazy to even crazier.

shows.title: Mr Bates vs The Post Office: The Real Story
shows.description: The true story of the fight against The Post Office - eye-opening doc
shows.descriptionEpg: Eye-opening documentary - the real story of the widest miscarriage of justice in British legal history. Hundreds of subpostmasters were accused of crimes that were not theirs.

shows.title: Footballers' Wives
shows.description: The iconic wives are here to entertain you! Treat yourself to the boxset
shows.descriptionEpg: Fame, fortune & football are all that matters in this outrageous drama. For the wives of top footballers, being in the spotlight & keeping your secrets safe is a constant struggle.

shows.title: Love/Hate
shows.description: Enter the criminal underworld - the thrilling Dublin gangland drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Thrilling Dublin gangland drama starring Aidan Gillen. When a catastrophic event ignites tensions in a small-time drug gang, family and friends are left grappling with the impact.

shows.title: The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
shows.description: Ryan Reynolds leads an all star cast in this all-action comedy sequel
shows.descriptionEpg: Action crime comedy film sequel starring Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L Jackson, 2021. Michael Bryce and assassin Darius Kincaid renew their friendship trying to save Darius' wife.

shows.title: Red Eye
shows.description: A race against time, a deadly flight - the brand new all-action thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Jing Lusi and Richard Armitage star in a race against time at 30,000 feet. When a man is flown back to China to answer his 'crimes', he finds himself in a deadly conspiracy.

shows.title: Trigger Point
shows.description: It's down to the wire - catch Vicky McClure in the explosive series
shows.descriptionEpg: Vicky McClure stars in this nail-bitingly tense thriller following London bomb disposal experts working for the Met.

shows.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
shows.description: Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Tommy Lee-Jones & a hell of a thrill ride!
shows.descriptionEpg: Jason Statham and Jessica Alba star in this non-stop action thriller. Forced out of retirement when his girlfriend is kidnapped, an assassin risks it all to try and save her.

shows.title: Irvine Welsh's Crime
shows.description: The gritty thriller returns for Series 2 - Dougray Scott stars
shows.descriptionEpg: Gritty thriller written by Irvine Welsh and starring Dougray Scott. Troubled detective Ray Lennox is ready to return to work, keen to prove he has recovered from his breakdown.

shows.title: The Walk In
shows.description: Don't miss Stephen Graham in this explosive state-of-the-world drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Stephen Graham shines in this explosive state-of-the-world drama. Based on real events, it follows an activist and his advocacy group as they confront an extremist organisation.

shows.title: Quantum of Solace
shows.description: A vengeful Bond takes on a shadowy organisation in this thrilling tale
shows.descriptionEpg: Daniel Craig is a vengeful Bond racked by betrayal in this action-packed tale. As he tracks a shadowy organisation, little does he know this chase will push him to the limit.

shows.title: Crank
shows.description: Jason Statham is in full action-man mode in this high-octane thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Jason Statham is in full action-man mode in this high-octane thriller. An assassin is injected with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level.

shows.title: The Flash
shows.description: Catch the epic DC superhero series - now streaming on ITVX!
shows.descriptionEpg: Catch the epic DC superhero series and Arrow spinoff. Struck by a thunder bolt, a brilliant scientist gains the gift of superhuman speed and vows to defend his city against evil.

shows.title: The Tower
shows.description: Gemma Whelan treads the dark path of policing in this gritty thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Gemma Whelan and Jimmy Akingbola tread the dark path of policing in this gritty thriller. When cops are called to a tower block crime scene, a baffling mystery begins.

shows.title: Mad Max: Beyond Thunderdome
shows.description: Mel Gibson takes on Tina Turner in this post-apocalyptic masterpiece
shows.descriptionEpg: Mel Gibson takes on Tina Turner in this post-apocalyptic masterpiece. After being banished from a remote town, Max allies himself with a gang of orphaned children in the desert.

shows.title: G'wed
shows.description: Full on, funny, with bags of heart - your new comedy obsession
shows.descriptionEpg: Exclusive ITVX comedy - full on, funny and with bags of heart. Meet this unforgettable group of Liverpool teens surviving with a sense of humour as they tackle life’s big issues.

shows.title: The Originals
shows.description: Magic, blood & the power of family - it’s the Vampire Diaries spin-off
shows.descriptionEpg: Dark fantasy drama - a spin-off from The Vampire Diaries series. A vampire family seeks retribution, redemption and romance when they settle in New Orleans.

shows.title: Bay of Fires
shows.description: Hiding from danger in a deadly town - catch this dark crime thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: A high-flyer is forced into witness protection in this sharply funny crime thriller. When Stella arrives in her new ‘home’ the locals seem suspicious -  maybe murderously so...

shows.title: The Fortune Hotel
shows.description: Who will triumph in this devious game? Stream the boxset now
shows.descriptionEpg: You can’t trust anyone at The Fortune Hotel. Join Stephen Mangan at a luxury resort filled with glamour and deception as ten pairs compete for £250K.

shows.title: Midsomer Murders
shows.description: Visit Britain's most murderous county...
shows.descriptionEpg: World-renowned murder mystery series set in the idyllic Midsomer county. Inspector Barnaby and his young sergeant probe an alarming number of suspicious deaths in the community.

shows.title: The Son
shows.description: Violence, greed & family ties - Pierce Brosnan is a ruthless oil tycoon
shows.descriptionEpg: Pierce Brosnan stars in this sweeping family epic about one man's path to riches. Watch young Eli McCullough transform from good-natured innocence to calculated violence.

shows.title: Tell Me Everything
shows.description: A new boy in a new town… but nobody knows his secrets - twisty new drama
shows.descriptionEpg: New home, new friends… same old problems? The twisty drama is back, and it’s all change for Jonny as he starts again in a place where no one knows his secrets.

shows.title: Superstore
shows.description: The best workplace comedy since The Office? Stream every series
shows.descriptionEpg: Hilarious workplace comedy about a quirky bunch of supermarket employees. Together they tackle the daily grind of rabid bargain hunters, riot-causing sales & nap-worthy training.

shows.title: The Beast Must Die
shows.description: A gripping revenge thriller - stream the full boxset now
shows.descriptionEpg: Cush Jumbo & Jared Harris star in this gripping revenge thriller. A grieving mother seeks justice at any cost, while a detective races to unpick the web of tragedy.

shows.title: Smallville
shows.description: Superman - the early years... catch every episode of this hit show
shows.descriptionEpg: Hit US Drama about Superman’s early years. As he struggles with the transition from boy to man, Clark finds that his strange abilities set him apart from his peers.

shows.title: Passenger
shows.description: "Happy Valley meets Twin Peaks" - thrilling new crime drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Wunmi Mosaku stars as the ambitious detective in this darkly comic and twisty crime drama. Strange crimes start happening in Chadder Vale, but who - or what is behind them?

shows.title: Colony
shows.description: Impossible choices in a treacherous world - blistering sci-fi boxset
shows.descriptionEpg: Blistering sci-fi boxset. In a dystopian future ruled by an oppressive regime, a family tries to survive while fighting on different sides.

shows.title: Skyfall
shows.description: Daniel Craig & Dame Judi Dench thrill in this iconic Bond resurrection
shows.descriptionEpg: Daniel Craig and Dame Judi Dench star in Sam Mendes' resurrection of Bond. When an ex-MI6 agent steals secret info to carry out a vendetta, Bond must face his past to save M.

shows.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
shows.description: Cameron Diaz, JLo, Anna Kendrick… spot the stars in this hit romcom
shows.descriptionEpg: Spot the stars in this hit romcom, including Cameron Diaz and JLo. Inspired by the best-selling book, a revealing look at the highs and lows of pregnancy in all its glory.

shows.title: Ghost
shows.description: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore & Whoopi Goldberg in the iconic 90s thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg star in the iconic Nineties thriller. A ghost stranded in New York City is determined to communicate with the woman he loves.

shows.title: Happy Gilmore
shows.description: Don’t miss Adam Sandler as the sporting underdog - outrageous fun
shows.descriptionEpg: Adam Sandler is the sporting underdog in this outrageous comedy. A would-be hockey star finds his skills better employed as a golfer and tries to use this to help his family.

shows.title: Winter's Bone
shows.description: Jennifer Lawrence fights to protect her family - unflinching thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Jennifer Lawrence stars in this unflinching thriller set in the bleak Missouri Ozark Mountains. She tries to hunt down her drug-dealing father while trying to protect her family.

shows.title: Celebrity Ex On The Beach
shows.description: Celebs including Joey Essex head off for a summer of luuurve
shows.descriptionEpg: Celebs including Joey Essex & Callum best head off for a summer of love in this sun-soaked reality series. But they better watch out for the Tablet of Terror!

shows.title: Five Days
shows.description: A picture-perfect family, a strange disappearance - Suranne Jones stars
shows.descriptionEpg: Anthology series starring Suranne Jones and Hugh Bonneville, tracking five 24-hour police investigations. In the first, a beautiful young mother is abducted in odd circumstances.

shows.title: Cliffhanger
shows.description: Sylvester Stallone is the daring mountain rescuer in this tense thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Sylvester Stallone stars in this nail-biting thriller. The leader of a mountain rescue team who has lost his nerve must overcome his fears to take on a gang of outlaws. 1993

shows.title: Geordie Shore
shows.description: Get ready to head into Toon for the nation's wildest reality show
shows.descriptionEpg: Head into Toon for the nation's wildest reality show. Join the lads and lasses of Newcastle as they work and party together. Expect drunken fights, wild dancing and buff bods.

shows.title: Marriage
shows.description: Sean Bean & Nicola Walker are a tour de force in this intimate drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Drama starring Sean Bean and Nicola Walker, about a married couple negotiating the insecurities, ambiguities, hopes, fears, risks and gifts of a long-term intimate relationship.

shows.title: Downton Abbey
shows.description: Maggie Smith & Hugh Bonneville star in Julian Fellowes’ hit series
shows.descriptionEpg: Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern star in Julian Fellowes’ hit series, a glittering period drama following the lives of the aristocratic Crawley family.

shows.title: Fat Friends
shows.description: Ruth Jones & James Corden star in this classic comedy drama
shows.descriptionEpg: Laugh-out-loud comedy drama starring Ruth Jones and James Corden. Welcome to the local slimming club, run by the formidable Carol. But everyone supports each other, come what may.

shows.title: Scott & Bailey
shows.description: Suranne Jones and Lesley Sharp are shrewd coppers solving grisly crimes
shows.descriptionEpg: Suranne Jones and Lesley Sharp star as quick-witted detectives in Manchester’s Met Police. Despite complicated private lives, the pair throw everything at solving each new murder.

shows.title: Total Recall
shows.description: Don't miss Arnold Schwarzenegger in this all-action sci-fi thriller
shows.descriptionEpg: Don't miss Arnold Schwarzenegger in this all-action sci-fi thriller. A construction worker discovers that a memory chip implanted in his brain now makes threat to the government.

shows.title: DCI Banks
shows.description: Gruesome murders, a no-nonsense detective - can he decipher the clues?
shows.descriptionEpg: Stephen Tompkinson plays a no-nonsense Yorkshire detective tackling new cases with weary professionalism. Watch him doggedly decipher the clues in gruesome murders.

shows.title: All your favourite BritBox shows in one place
shows.subtitle: Stream all the best British TV from BritBox. From drama to comedy and films to documentaries - there's something for everyone

shows.descriptionEpg: Comedy drama starring Katherine Parkinson and Youssef Kerkour. After drastic events, two lonely neighbours embark on an unlikely relationship.

shows.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
shows.description: Breakneck show packed with top stand-up routines - stream it all now

shows.title: Mr Bean
shows.description: Rowan Atkinson stars as the one and only Mr Bean - what a legend!
shows.descriptionEpg: Rowan Atkinson stars as the one and only Mr Bean. Watch the poor man attempt to deal with ordinary situations in the most extraordinary of ways.

shows.title: Benidorm
shows.description: Join this motley crew of sunseekers by the pool - stream every ep

shows.title: Fisk
shows.description: Top comedy to make you laugh until you cry - dive into both series now
shows.descriptionEpg: Stream both series of this laugh-out-loud comedy starring Kitty Flanagan. A high-end contracts lawyer is forced to take a less ambitious job following her marriage breakdown.

shows.title: Community
shows.description: Join the misfits surviving community college in this star-studded sitcom
shows.descriptionEpg: Head back to school with this star-studded, smash-hit 00s comedy. When fake lawyer Jeff is forced to get an actual qualification, he soon falls in with a band of fellow misfits.

collection.headingTitle: Showcase Drama sponsored by Direct Line

shows.title: Showcase Drama Collection
shows.subtitle: Enjoy great stories from Showcase Drama, including Mr Bates vs The Post Office, Red Eye, Archie and Sanditon.

shows.title: Archie: the man who became Cary Grant
shows.description: The untold story of Hollywood’s greatest leading man - Jason Isaacs stars

shows.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
shows.description: Get stuck in as six teens get up close & personal with dinosaurs
shows.descriptionEpg: This animated series follows six teenagers as they are the first selected to experience the world's most incredible adventure camp - Camp Cretaceous!

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! Abracadabra-Doo
shows.description: Strange sightings at a magic academy... what's going on?
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated family comedy featuring the voices of Frank Welker and Matthew Lillard. The gang visits Velma's younger sister Madelyn at a magic academy, and find some strange sightings.

shows.title: Lloyd of the Flies
shows.description: He's only one centimetre high but Lloyd is a fly with a lot to prove
shows.descriptionEpg: He's one centimetre high, but Lloyd is a fly with a lot to prove. He lives in an apple with 225 maggots, and he's always getting into scrapes with his friend Abacus the woodlouse.

shows.title: Soccer Aid for UNICEF
shows.description: Join these celebs for a cheeky game of footie - all for a good cause!
shows.descriptionEpg: England takes on the Soccer Aid World XI for the charity football match in aid of UNICEF, including reports on how the money raised can help.

shows.title: Soccer Aid for UNICEF: The Warm Up
shows.description: Catch all the interviews & gossip from the Soccer Aid training camp!
shows.descriptionEpg: England takes on the Soccer Aid World XI for the charity football match in aid of UNICEF, including reports on how the money raised can help.

shows.title: Saturday Night Every Night
shows.description: The ultimate night in on ITVX
shows.strapline: The ultimate night in on ITVX
shows.subtitle: Get stuck into quizzes, games, talent shows & more!

shows.title: Britain's Got Talent
shows.description: Always entertaining, always surprising - stream the boxset now
shows.descriptionEpg: Simon Cowell is joined by a panel of celebrity judges in the search for Britain's next big talent act. Expect singers, dancers, comedians and unusual talents of all kinds!

shows.title: Big Zuu's 12 Dishes in 12 Hours
shows.description: One celeb, a tonne of food & the world’s tastiest cities!
shows.descriptionEpg: Join chef-rapper Big Zuu and his celeb guests as they visit the world’s tastiest cities, eating 12 delicious dishes - anything from street food to fine dining - in only 12 hours!

shows.title: The 1% Club
shows.description: Have you ever wondered how clever you are? Lee Mack wants to know
shows.descriptionEpg: Ever wondered how clever you are? Well, Lee Mack's offering you a chance to find out! To win £100k, contestants must answer a question that only 1% of the UK get right.

shows.title: An Audience with Kylie
shows.description: Join the pop icon for a musical extravaganza
shows.descriptionEpg: Global superstar Kylie Minogue hosts the biggest Audience with... to date for one night only at the legendary Royal Albert Hall in front of fans and a specially invited audience.

shows.title: ITV Studio Sessions
shows.description: Britain’s brightest music stars perform live - stream every ep now
shows.descriptionEpg: Britain’s brightest music stars perform live in intimate sessions. Watch new and emerging artists give stripped-back performances & revealing interviews with Clara Amfo at The O2.

shows.title: Beat the Chasers
shows.description: They have the confidence of kings - so who can outsmart all six Chasers?
shows.descriptionEpg: Bradley Walsh presents this lively spin-off of hit quiz show The Chase. Challengers go head-to-head with not one but six Chasers in a battle for big cash prizes.

shows.title: BGT Reacts
shows.description: Join our famous faces reacting to Britain's Got Talent
shows.descriptionEpg: Join our famous faces reacting to Britain's Got Talent. Expect fun-filled games, awesome talent, hilarious judge comments and OMG! moments.

shows.title: In With A Shout
shows.description: It’s back! The show where you shout at the telly… for money!
shows.descriptionEpg: Joel Dommett hosts ITV's new high-octane gameshow, where contestants must shout to win big. Two families face each other in a race to answer hidden questions and win £20,000.

shows.title: In for a Penny
shows.description: The portable, pop-up game show where the British public are the real stars.
shows.descriptionEpg: Stephen Mulhern's on a trip around the country in a new series, as he hits the streets with his epic portable game show. Watch unsuspecting members of the public play along.

items.episodeTitle: The latest ITV News headlines - as fights mar build up to England v Serbia
items.synopsis: Watch a short summary of today's top stories from the ITV News team.

items.episodeTitle: Anticipation building as England begin Euro 2024 campaign against Serbia
items.synopsis: Thousands of fans have travelled to Gelsenkirchen ahead of the England's first match of the tournament tonight.

items.episodeTitle: Man wielding 'axe and incendiary device' shot by police in Hamburg
items.synopsis: The incident happened in the city centre, where thousands of football fans had gathered ahead of the Netherlands v Poland in Euro 2024.

items.episodeTitle: Think tank: Labour and Conservative plans will leave the NHS 'worse off than austerity'
items.synopsis: Analysis from The Nuffield Trust has found that both parties' plans would squeeze the NHS budget without further spending commitments.

items.episodeTitle: The General Election explained: How do policies on the NHS stack up?
items.synopsis: ITV News Health Correspondent Rebecca Barry assesses each of the main parties' policies on the NHS, which is facing a vast array of challenges.

items.episodeTitle: Euro 2024: Who will England and Scotland play?
items.synopsis: The Euros are finally here and it’s England and Scotland representing the home nations. So, who will each side play, and when should you clear your diaries?

items.episodeTitle: Election Matters: Can we trust opinion polls, and how do they shape our politics?
items.synopsis: ITV News election analyst Professor Jane Green explains how polls work, whether we can trust them, and how they do much more than create headlines.

items.episodeTitle: Israeli military announces 'tactical pause' in southern Gaza operations
items.synopsis: The break in the fighting will last for 11 hours from 8am and will take place every day, in an attempt to allow humanitarian aid to reach the Rafah area.

items.episodeTitle: Talking Politics: The Election - Is Nigel Farage now "the leader of the opposition" as he claims?
Princess of Wales appears in public for first time since cancer diagnosis
items.synopsis: Kate was seen for the first time this year, as she rode in a carriage at the Trooping the Colour parade. Yesterday she said she was making "good progress".

items.episodeTitle: The Rundown: ITV News' daily update for teenagers
items.synopsis: Watch a new edition of The Rundown every afternoon.

items.episodeTitle: Sunshine with a few scattered showers: Watch the latest ITV forecast
items.synopsis: Watch the latest UK forecast from the ITV Weather team

items.episodeTitle: Watch the latest ITV News
items.synopsis: Catch up on the latest UK and international stories from ITV News.

items.episodeTitle: Eriksen's special goal
items.synopsis: 1,100 days after suffering a cardiac arrest at the last European Championship's Denmark's Christian Eriksen scores on his return to the tournament

items.episodeTitle: Euros Rewind
items.synopsis: We delve into the European Championship archives going back to 1992 when Denmark unexpectedly reigned supreme

items.episodeTitle: Super Sub Weghorst makes desired impact
items.synopsis: Substitute Wout Weghorst scored after just two minutes of coming on to score the decisive goal in The Netherlands' clash with Poland in group D

items.episodeTitle: The fastest goal in European Championship history!
items.synopsis: Albania's Nedim Bajrami made history scoring fastest goal in European Championship history in just 23 seconds, against Italy in their Group B opener

items.episodeTitle: Group B: Spain v Croatia - Highlights of Spain v Croatia
McGregor: "We didn't get it right"
items.synopsis: Scotland's Callum McGregor bemoaned his sides performance against Germany, but believes they have what it takes to improve in the competition

items.episodeTitle: Walker and Southgate selection
items.synopsis: ITV's discuss Kyle Waller's stellar England career, and look at the line-up options for England's opener against Serbia on Sunday

items.episodeTitle: Roy Keane fumes at Scotland's performance against Germany
items.synopsis: Roy Keane held nothing back after Scotland were battered by Germany

items.episodeTitle: Spain in the conversation
items.synopsis: Roy Keane and co believe Spain have to be in the conversation for Euro 2024 glory after a solid win over Croatia, with youngster Lamine Yamal impressing

items.episodeTitle: Croatia no goal!
items.synopsis: Croatia's Bruno Petkovic has a goal disallowed by VAR after players ran into the box too quickly from a penalty took just seconds earlier

items.episodeTitle: Ian Wright remembers Kevin Campbell
items.synopsis: Ian Wright paid tribute to friend and former Arsenal teammate Kevin Campbell, who passed away, aged 54, on Saturday

items.episodeTitle: LIVE: ITVX's exclusive Euro 2024 channel
Can England go all the way in 2024?
items.synopsis: We go inside the England camp to speak to manager Gareth Southgate ahead of England's first game of Euro 2024

items.description: The drama’s hotting up! It's a scorching summer of love - new eps daily

items.title: Love After Lock Up
items.description: Can love survive a prison sentence? These couples find out…

items.title: Love/Hate
items.description: Enter the criminal underworld - the thrilling Dublin gangland drama

items.description: A race against time, a deadly flight - the brand new all-action thriller

items.description: Housewives past & present bring all the goss - new eps each Monday

items.description: Magic, blood & the power of family - it’s the Vampire Diaries spin-off

items.description: Every kick, every goal - stream highlights of every game
